1.text: And Jehovah speaketh unto Moses, saying,

2.text: ‘Command the sons of Israel, and thou hast said unto them, My offering, My bread for My fire-offerings, My sweet fragrance, ye take heed to bring near to Me in its appointed season.

3.text: And thou hast said to them, This is the fire-offering which ye bring near to Jehovah: two lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones, daily, a continual burnt-offering;

4.text: the one lamb thou preparest in the morning, and the second lamb thou preparest between the evenings;

5.text: and a tenth of the ephah of flour for a present, mixed with beaten oil, a fourth of the hin;

6.text: a continual burnt-offering, which was made in mount Sinai, for sweet fragrance, a fire-offering to Jehovah;

7.text: and its libation, a fourth of the hin for the one lamb; in the sanctuary cause thou a libation of strong drink to be poured out to Jehovah.

8.text: ‘And the second lamb thou dost prepare between the evenings; as the present of the morning, and as its libation thou preparest—a fire-offering, a sweet fragrance to Jehovah.

9.text: ‘And on the sabbath-day, two lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones, and two-tenth deals of flour, a present, mixed with oil, and its libation;

10.text: the burnt-offering of the sabbath in its sabbath, besides the continual burnt-offering and its libation.

11.text: ‘And in the beginnings of your months ye bring near a burnt-offering to Jehovah: two bullocks, sons of the herd, and one ram, seven lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones;

12.text: and three-tenth deals of flour, a present, mixed with oil, for the one bullock, and two-tenth deals of flour, a present, mixed with oil, for the one ram;

13.text: and a several tenth deal of flour, a present, mixed with oil, for the one lamb; a burnt-offering, a sweet fragrance, a fire-offering to Jehovah;

14.text: and their libations are a half of the hin to a bullock, and a third of the hin to a ram, and a fourth of the hin to a lamb, of wine; this is the burnt-offering of every month for the months of the year;

15.text: and one kid of the goats for a sin-offering to Jehovah; besides the continual burnt-offering it is prepared, and its libation.

16.text: And in the first month, in the fourteenth day of the month, is the passover to Jehovah;

17.text: and in the fifteenth day of this month is a festival, seven days unleavened food is eaten;

18.text: in the first day is an holy convocation, ye do no servile work,

19.text: and ye have brought near a fire-offering, a burnt-offering to Jehovah: two bullocks, sons of the herd, and one ram, and seven lambs, sons of a year, perfect ones they are for you;

20.text: and their present, flour mixed with oil, three-tenth deals for a bullock, and two-tenth deals for a ram ye do prepare;

21.text: a several tenth deal thou preparest for the one lamb, for the seven lambs,

22.text: and one goat, a sin-offering, to make atonement for you.

23.text: Apart from the burnt-offering of the morning, which is for the continual burnt-offering, ye prepare these;

24.text: according to these ye prepare daily, seven days, bread of a fire-offering, a sweet fragrance, to Jehovah; besides the continual burnt-offering it is prepared, and its libation;

25.text: and on the seventh day a holy convocation ye have, ye do no servile work.

26.text: ‘And in the day of the first-fruits, in your bringing near a new present to Jehovah, in your weeks, a holy convocation ye have; ye do no servile work;

27.text: and ye have brought near a burnt-offering for sweet fragrance to Jehovah: two bullocks, sons of the herd, one ram, seven lambs, sons of a year,

28.text: and their present, flour mixed with oil, three-tenth deals to the one bullock, two-tenth deals to the one ram,

29.text: a several tenth deal to the one lamb, for the seven lambs;

30.text: one kid of the goats to make atonement for you;

31.text: apart from the continual burnt-offering and its present ye prepare them (perfect ones they are for you) and their libations.
